data.message: Hello Facebook Can you tell mein how to verify my business  fb page?

replies.message: Hi Iftikhar. We’re currently only accepting verification requests from Pages that represent celebrities, public figures, sports teams, media and entertainment. Please keep in mind that most Pages and profiles, including local businesses, aren't eligible for verification at this time. You can learn more at: http://bit.ly/2le3K3w. -Joe

Facebook Thanks Joe for your ans but joe my page is public figure, i m principal of a institute. most pages are verified as a teacher. but i am still..........!! if you don.t mind plz tell me how to proper way to verify public figures page ?
i m trying to do this work before 4 to 5 years but failed.
